mapper.select: select id,submit_time from form where template_id = #{temp_id}

select id,template_id,position,compType,ele,title,disabled,compIcon,width,active_text as 'active-text',inactive_text as 'inactive-text', active_color as 'active-color',inactive_color as 'inactive-color',showLabel,required from switch where template_id = #{temp_id}
select value from comp_value where form_id = #{form_id} and component_id = #{component_id} and compType = #{type}
mapper.update: update comp_value set value = #{value} where component_id = #{comp_id} and form_id = #{form_id} and compType = #{type}
mapper.select: select id,template_id,position,compType,ele,content_position as 'content-position',child,showLabel,compIcon from divider where template_id = #{temp_id}
select id,template_id,position,compType,ele,title,compIcon,showLabel,min,max,disabled,step,show_stop as 'show-stop',required from slider where template_id = #{temp_id}
select id,template_id,position,compType,ele,compIcon,type,showLabel,title,row_s as 'rows',disabled,required from textarea where template_id = #{temp_id}
select * from template where name like concat('%',#{name},'%')
